sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>tree</radical> has an <radical>omen</radical> growing from it, one single <kanji>peach</kanji> that is the size of a house. Inside is a child who will save the village from demons.
meaningInfo: Of course, this tree omen of a <kanji>peach</kanji> refers to momotaro, the little boy who was born from a peach (you should look it up if you don't know this children's story).
readingMnemonic: If <reading>momo</reading>taro (<ja>もも</ja>) wasn't enough, think about the <kanji>peach</kanji> growing larger and larger. You want it to grow bigger, so you yell at it: "<reading>MO</reading>RE! <reading>MO</reading>RE!" (<ja>もも</ja>).
readingInfo: It grows bigger everytime you say "MORE MORE" twice. If you say it just once, it stays the same.
